title: Camera
description: A camera is a device that records images of people and objects on a light-sensitive surface. The word camera comes from the Latin words camera obscura, which means . This is because the earliest cameras were used in darkened rooms to capture images.

title: Bluetooth Headset
description: A Bluetooth headset is a wireless device that allows you to connect your phone or other Bluetooth-enabled device to your ears so you can listen to music or talk on the phone without wires.

title: Premium Bottled water
description: Water is an inorganic compound made of hydrogen and oxygen (H2O) that exists in three states: liquid, gas (steam or water vapor), and solid (ice).
